resources.string:
" App and internet homepage available in these languages:
  • ar,  de,  en,  es,  fr,  it,  ja,  nl, pl,  ro , ru,  tr,  zh-CN,  zh-TW
  • Help us to translate this app into other languages:
    • On a pc with keyboard and internet access through the crowdin.com website.
    • On android through the "A Photo Manager" menu Settings/Translate using the stringlate app.
"

"# # Generated with \'%1$s\' Version %2$s. # # This properties file contain sqlite sql formulas for the context data in the image view in the format # name=sql expression. # # name is the menu title where the sql belongs to. # # for all available columns see the "Details" label # # '|' will be replaced by newline '\\n' # "

" A Photo Manager
Version AndroFotoFinder $versionName$
$about$
$translate$

Minimal requirements: Android 4.0 (API 14), Internet/WiFi connection to download geodata and a SD card to cache geodata and to store photos

Licence: GPLv3

Required permissions:

  • INTERNET: to download map data from Open Street Map Server
  • ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE and ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: to find out if WiFi/Internet is online to start downloading geodata if necessary
  • WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to cache downloaded map data in local file system and to do file operations.
  • READ_LOGS after app crash the logcat is written to /mnt/sdcard/copy/log/androFotofinder.logcat*.txt .

The code uses

  • osmdroid library to display online maps from Open Street Map
  • Andrid Stringlate app to allow the app user to thranslate this app to other gui-languages
  • mapsforge library to display offline maps
  • chris bane's PhotoView that implemnts the zoomable image view. Using k3b-s extended version with "reload on zoom" and "hugeimage-support") that has not been merged into the original yet
  • Sergey Tarasevich's Android-Universal-Image-Loader for manageing miniatur image previews(thumbnails)
  • k3b-geoHelper for handling geo-uri-s
  • drew noakes metadata-extractor to display extended exif info
  • Sergey Tarasevich-s Android-Universal-Image-Loader a Powerful and flexible library for loading, caching and displaying (thumbnail-) images on Android.
  • slf4j logging for java with the https://github.com/lp0/slf4j-android driver
  • junit testing support with Mockito
  • junit testing support with Mockito

History

See History.

Links

  • Source code of current version of "a Photo Manager" (A(ndro)FotoFinder) at git repository@github.com
    https://github.com/k3b/APhotoManager/
  • APhotoManager Changelog
  • Source code of osmdroid library at git repository@github.com
    https://github.com/osmdroid/osmdroid
  • slf4j logging for java org.slf4j:slf4j-api
    http://www.slf4j.org/
  • slf4j logging driver for android eu.lp0.slf4j:slf4j-android
    https://github.com/lp0/slf4j-android
  • junit testing support junit:junit
    http://junit.org/
  • Mockito testing support
    https://github.com/mockito/mockito
  • Geographic data comes from Open Street Map
    http://www.openstreetmap.org
  • The GPLv3 license is available at
    http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0
